● Carpenters construct, erect, install, and repair structures and fixtures made from wood and other materials.

● Read blueprints as well as taking direction from verbal and written descriptions.

● A tailor is someone who sews, joins, reinforces, or finishes clothing or other items.

● They may create new pieces of clothing from patterns and designs or alter existing garments to fit customers better.

● They work for textile and apparel manufacturers, department stores, and dry cleaners.

● Hire our professional tailors to feature your imagination on Outfits.
